name: stockfish-mv.wasm
description: WebAssembly port of the strong chess engine Stockfish with multi-variant support
author: Niklas Fiekas <niklas.fiekas@backscattering.de>

scripts.prepare: cd src && make clean && make ARCH=wasm build && cd .. && cat preamble.js src/stockfish.js > stockfish.js && cp src/pthread-main.js . && cp src/stockfish.js.mem . && cp src/stockfish.wasm .
